mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode

select deal.addressId, address.apartName, address.dongCode, address.buildYear, deal.dealAmount, deal.dealYear, deal.dealMonth, deal.dealDay, deal.area, deal.floor from house_deal deal, address left join sidocode si on left(address.dongcode, 2) = left(si.sidocode, 2) left join guguncode gu on left(address.dongcode, 5) = left(gu.guguncode, 5) where dongCode = #{dong} limit 0, 100;
